snippet: More Nobelists convey their views of the evidence that humans are exerting a growing, and troubling, influence on the global climate.
abstract: More Nobelists convey their views of the evidence that humans are exerting a growing, and troubling, influence on the global climate.
lead_paragraph: 3:05 p.m. | Updated |Given the flurry of attention this week around what two batches of scientists of various stripes think of evidence that humans are exerting a growing and disruptive influence on climate, it's worth checking in with two Nobel laureates who've long been focused on the atmosphere and climate.

headline.main: Two Nobelists Offer Views of Human-Driven Global Warming
